body.name: IDEALHOUSE King Size Bed Frame Platform with Headboard, Industrial 14 inch King Bedframe No Box Spring Needed, Easy to Assemble Noise Free Metal King Mattress Foundation, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 10 mins
features: STURDY & DURABLE - Constructed with 9 support legs and 14 heavy-duty steel slats, the weight capacity of this king size bed frame can stand max up to 700lbs for most familys needed. The Industrial wooden grain headboard and footboard provides better support to your mattress, you will feel very sturdy when lying on our king bed.

EXTRA STORAGE SPACE - Our king bed frame size is 81”L x 77.15”W x 37.2”H, weight: 77 pounds. 13.8'' Under-Bed Space make it a great option for under-bed storage such as suitcases, tools or even sweeping robot, it’s the best choice for space saving and keep your room tidy. No need to worry about limited storage space in the bedroom anymore.

VINTAGE HEADBOARD & FOOTBOARD - The combination of vintage MDF board & black metal bed frame takes a mild industrial look and rustic style without being overly trendy. This retro king size bed frame is a sleek finishing decoration to your bedroom, suitable for most bedroom style.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - What our king size bed platform can bring to you is Non-shaky, Non-Slip, Noise Free and Non-squeaky. Also it is no box spring needed, you can directly put your mattress on it. This king size bed frame with headboard are professionally designed with all parts well-crafted, I believe it's a trusted buying experience.

EASY ASSEMBLE & SERVICE - All the parts and tools of our king platform bed frame are marked out in the manual. Clear assembly instruction helps people with zero assembly experience. It only takes around 60 minutes to complete the installation. Any problems with this king bed frame, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with 24 hours professional customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IDEALHOUSE King Size Metal Bed Frame with Wooden Headboard and Footboard What Makes This King Size Bed Frame with Headboard Worth Getting? This well-crafted platform bed frame with rustic vintage wood headboard matches the country style that you want.Matte black metal constructed bed frame features a wood panel headboard and footboard for a minimalist look. Weight capacity:700 lbs.Sturdy, Durable, and Noise Free. This king bed platform frame is very stable. Non-shaky, Non-Slip, Noise Free, and Non-squeaky. No Box Spring Needed.

Vintage High-grade MDF Board The headboard and footboard of wood grain have unparalleled touch and texture. Bring a retro atmosphere to your bedroom. Sturdy and Durable Frame Build with 9 legs and 14pcs of heavy-duty steel slats for stability and durability. You will feel very sturdy when laying on our bed frame. Noise Free Design The platform bed frame provides buckles that lock the metal slats tightly, and there are foot supports on both sides and in the middle, which prevents the noise from slats.
SPECIFICATION Size King Size Bed Frame Color Rustic board and black frame Dimensions 77.15"L x 81"W x 37.2"H Free Delivery Yes for all region Hassle-free Buying Yes for all customer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son really likes this bed. The metal frame makes it very sturdy. I like that the foot board doesn't stick up so he can still sit comfortably on the edge of the foot of the bed. I also like that the foot board goes all the way to the floor so you can't see under the bed from the door when you walk through the hallway. It is a lovely color and has a masculine feel for a boys bedroom. It has been easy to find mathing furniture on Amazon as well. It was easy to put together, probably took 30 minutes all together. Directions were clear and easy to follow. Packaging was compact. Shipping was faster than expected. Overall happy with the purchase and will recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This frame was very easy to put together absolutely enjoyed how sturdy it is. Definitely worth the price it's gonna definitely last and the wood portion is very pretty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great sturdy bed frame, my only complaint is that it came damaged on one corner of the foot board. Otherwise I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewerName: Great product!!! Easy to assemble, sturdy, and looks nice in my daughter’s room.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loves it!!!
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great bed frame. Very easy assembly snd comes with all needed tools to build. My daughter loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall great for price.
reviews.reviewText: Bed frame is good. Comes with all pieces to built it. Easy to assemble. Did come a little bent in some of the joints. (The ones for the head board that attach to the legs.) nothing a flat head couldn’t fix to attach the lower legs. Also did come a bit scratched. But paint didn’t come off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy bed frame for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had inexpensive bedframes before that were wobbly and squeaky, but not this one! It’s very sturdy and looks great in my room! Would definitely recommend to someone looking to add a little bit of an aesthetic to their room without a hefty price tag! I bought the queen size and my mattress fits on it perfectly! I like the lip at the foot of the frame, which sticks up just enough to keep the mattress from sliding. I’m very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the bed a lot so did my daughter I bought it for her. The only draw back is it was a bit heard for us to assemble, but we got it eventually and it's really nice love it💓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super annoyed we had been waiting for like a week for the bed to ship, then when it came the box had shoe marks all over it! It looked like it had been through a stampede. Then a couple of the metal pieces had been bent, so we had to hammer them into the correct position. Frustrating to say the least.
